titles.title: Hunting, Fishing, and Recreational Shooting Protection Act
Hunting, Fishing, and Recreational Shooting Protection Act

A bill to amend the Toxic Substances Control Act to clarify the jurisdiction of the Environmental Protection Agency with respect to certain sporting good articles, and to exempt those articles from a definition under that Act.
Hunting, Fishing, and Recreational Shooting Protection Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Hunting, Fishing, and Recreational Shooting Protection Act
This bill exempts components of firearms and ammunition and sport fishing equipment and its components (such as lead sinkers) from regulations on chemical substances under the Toxic Substances Control Act.
